\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha parxsAda}
\meaning{\arthanonum{guruparxsAda, liMgaparxsAda, jaMgama parxsAda, parxsAda parxsAdaveMba nAlukx bageya parxsAdagaLu : parxsAdada parxkAragaLanunx vivarisuvAga vacana\-kAraralilx  omamxtavilalx. kelavaru parxsAdavu tirxvidhaveMdU, matetx kelavaru  parxsAdavu EkAdasha vidhaveMdU heVLidare, matetx kelavaru parxsAdavu catuviRdhaveMdu heVLidAdxre. catuviRdha parxsAdada bagegxyU vacanakAraralilx omamxtavilalx. catuviRdha parxsAdada bagege kaniSaThx mUru aBipArxyagaLive.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{kADasidedhxVshavxraneMba sharaNanu catuviRdha parxsAdaveMdare, acacx, nicacx, sidadhx matutx samayaveMba nAlukx vidhada parxsAda\-venunxtAtxne. alalxde, avelalxvanUnx I keLaginaMte vivarisidAdxne.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{guruvu (AcAyaRnu) shudadhx parxsAdada parxtiVka. avaniMda\break diVkeSx paDeda Bakatxnu tAnU guruvinaMtAgabeVku eMdu \hbox{parxtijecnx} mADabeVku. hiVge shudadhx parxsAdada savxrUpAcAyaRnanunx tanuvinalilx sAvxyata mADikoMDu (aMdare, AcAyaRnu boVdhisida AcAragaLanunx tanuvinalilx rUDhisikoMDu) A mUlaka tanuvina keTaTx guNagaLanunx naSaTxmADikoMDare, Aga nAvu tegedukoMDududu acacxparxsAda.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{guruvu karuNeyiMda koDuva iSaTxliMgavU oMdu\break parxsAdaveV. guru   koTaTx sidadhxparxsAdarUpavAda cililxMgavanunx Bakatxnu   manasisxnalilx sAvxyata mADikoMDare, adariMda mana\-sisxna duguRNagaLu naSaTxvAgabeVku. hAge naSaTxvAdare nAvu tegedukoMDa parxsAda nicacx (nitayx) parxsAda. liMgavu nitayxvAdudariMda, hAgU liMgaveV parxsAdavAdudariMda, adu nitayxparxsAda (nitayx = shAshavxtavAda liMgaveMba parxsAda) enisikoLuLxtatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{guru matutx liMga heVge parxsAdagaLoV hAgeyeV jaMgamavU saha oMdu parxsAdaveV. sidadhxparxsAdarUpanAda jaMgamavanunx Atamxdalilx sAvxyata mADikoMDare Aga Atamxda jiVvatavxBAva naSaTxvAgutatxde; Aga nAvu tegedukoMDududu samaya parxsAda. shudadhx, sidadhx matutx parxsAdasavxrUpavAda mahAliMgavU oMdu parxsAdaveV. A mahAliMgavanunx nAvu namamx savARMgadalilx sAvxyata mADikoMDare, Aga savARMgagaLa duSaTxguNagaLu naSaTxvAgi, pUNaRBakitx nelesutatxde. hiVge pUNaRBakitx nelesidare, nAvu tegedukoLuLxva parxsAda Eka parxsAda. ililx, Bakatxnu tananxnunx tAneV apiRsikoMDu (hAgU parxsAdavanAnxgi mADikoMDu) parxsAdigU parxsAdakUkx iruva aMtaravanunx aLisihAkuvudeV EkaparxsAdada athaR. Adare catuviRdha parxsAdavu parxsAdigiMta BinanxveMbudanunx gamanisabeVku. (10:162)}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{kuSaTxgi karibasaveVshavxraneMba vacanakArana parxkAra, catuviRdha parxsAdaveMdare, guruparxsAda, nitayxparxsAda, jAcnxnaparxsAda matutx\break sidadhxparxsAda eMba nAlukx vidhada parxsAda. avana parxkAra guru\-vina muKAMtara baMdudu guruparxsAda; liMgada muKAMtara baMdudu nitayxparxsAda; jaMgamada muKAMtara baMdudu jAcnxnaparxsAda matutx jAcnxnada muKAMtara baMdudu sidadhxparxsAda.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{guru koTaTx parxsAda guruparxsAda. liMgavu nitayxvAdudariMda,\break liMgamuKadiMda baMdudu nitayxparxsAdavenisikoLuLxtatxde. jaMgama\-veMdare liMgAMga sAmarasayxda mUlaka jAcnxna paDedAta. aMthavanu mAtarx beVreyavarige jAcnxna\-vanunx \hbox{niVDabalalx.} avaniMda baMda jAcnxnavU oMdu parxsAdaveV. vAsatxvavAgi, jAcnxnaparxsAdavu haNuNx, hAlu, muMtAda Bwtika parxsAdagaLigiMta hecucx sherxVSaThxvAdudu. jaMgamaniMda paDeda jAcnxnada mUlaka Bakatxnu AdhAyxtimxka sididhxyanunx paDedu, sidadhxnenisikoLuLxtAtxne; athavA jAcnxnamuKadalilx baMda parxsAdavu sidadhx parxsAda\-venisikoLuLxtatxde. (10:512)}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{gurusidadhx deVvaru eMba vacanakArana parxkAra, catuviRdha parxsAdada paTiTxyalilx guruparxsAda, liMgaparxsAda, jaMgamaparxsAda matutx nijaparxsAdagaLu seVrive. meVle heVLida padagaLeV ililxyU baLakeyAgidadxrU, avugaLa athaRdalilx  Binanxteyide. avana parxkAra, diVkASxvidhigaLa parxkAra guruvu  shiSayxnige koDuva iSaTxliMgaveV guruparxsAda; iSaTxliMga  pUjA\-vidhi\-gaLa parxkAra,\break guruvu shiSayxnige dashavidha pAdoVdaka  matutx EkAdasha parxsAda\-vanunx karuNisuvudeV liMgaparxsAda. saqSiTx  vicAra, Atamx\break vicAra, manuSayxnalilxruva yAva kalAshakitxge yAru  adhi\-deVvate, yAva Bakitxge yAva liMga, yAva cakarxdalilx yAva liMgavide, itAyxdi sakiVlagaLa rahasayxvanunx jaMgamanu (jAcnxnavanunx paDedavanu) shiSayxnige boVdhisuvudariMda, A boVdha\-neyeV jaMgamaparxsAdavenisikoLuLxtatxde. shiSayxnu\break I boVdhaneganuguNa\-vAgi naDedukoMDu, savARcAra,\break saMpatitxnoDagUDi BinanxBAvava tayxjisi, tAnu matutx liMga (parashiva) oMdeV eMba aikayxBAvavanunx anuBAvada mUlaka paDedukoMDare, tAneV nijaparxsAdavAgutAtxne. (10:679)}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{vAsatxvavAgi, alapx savxlapx badalAvaNegaLanunx horatupaDisi, catuviRdha parxsAdada bagegina I sharaNara kalapxnegaLu oMdeV teranidudx, avugaLa hesarugaLaSeTxV BinanxvAgive eMbudanunx nAvu  gamanisabahudu.}
\ullekha{shudadhx, sidadhx, parxsidadhx parxsAdatarxyada EkasavxrUpavAda mahAparxsAda. iMtiV nAlukx taraha parxsAdava koMDavaru AreMdaDe : hiMdakekx kalAyxNapuradalilx basavAdi parxBudeVvarAMtayxmAdavaLu nUrepapxtutx parxmatha gaNaMgaLu. (savasaM. 10; kADasi. 102-110)}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhaparxsAdaH, catuviRdhashacx asw parxsAdashacx - catuviRdhaparxsAdaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha parxsAdi}
\meaning{\arthanonum{guruparxsAdi, liMgaparxsAdi, jaMgamaparxsAdi matutx parxsAdaparxsAdi eMba nAlukx parxkArada parxsAdigaLu; visheVSavAgi guruBakatxyayx, parxBudeVvaru, basavaNaNx matutx bibibxbAcayayx eMba nAlavxranunx anukarxmavAgi guruparxsAdi, liMgaparxsAdi, jaMgamaparxsAdi matutx parxsAdaparxsAdi eMdu heVLutAtxre: (viV.pA.koV. 163)}
\ullekha{guruparxsAdi guruBakatxyayx liMgaparxsAdi\break parxBudeVvaru jaMgamaparxsAdi basavaNaNx parxsAdiparxsAdi bibibx\-bAcayayx mikikxna parxsAdigaLelalxrU ApAyxyana parxsAdigaLu iMtiV catuRviRdhaparxsAdigaLa parxsAdadiMdAnu badukidenayayx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 293-624).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhaparxsAdiV, catuviRdhaH parxsAdaH asitx asimxnf iti - catuviRdhaparxsAdiV}}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha pAdoVdaka}
\meaning{\arthanonum{gurupAdoVdaka, liMgapAdoVdaka, jaMgamapAdoVdaka matutx dhULapAdoVdakagaLeMba nAlukx bageya pAdoVdakagaLu: (viV.pA.koV. 162)}
\ullekha{EkAMtavAsadalilx pariNAma\-karavAda haLaLx hoLe kere bAvi maDu hoMDa cilume koLa modalAda sAthxnakekx hoVgi parxthamadalilx shivashiva hara\break\-hara gurubasavaliMga eMba maMtarxdhAyxnadiMda pAda\-vaniTuTx caraNasoVMkiniM pavitarxvAdudakave \textbf{dhULapAdoVdaka}venisuvadayayx AmeVle taMbigeyoLage shoVdhisi basavAkaSxrava liKisuvade \textbf{gurupAdoVdaka}venisuvadayayx AmeVle acaRnA\-kirxyegaLa tiVciRsikoMDu nicacxparxsAdi saMbaMdhAcaraNeyaMte mugidalilx \textbf{jaMgamapAdoVdaka}venisuvadayayx iMtu \textbf{catuviRdha\-pAdoVdaka}doLage SaDivxdhapAdoVdaka uMTayayx (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 51-16).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhapAdoVdakaM, catuviRdhaM ca tatf pAdoVdakaM ca - catuviRdhapAdoVdakaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha pAsha}
\meaning{\arthanonum{nAlukx riVtiya AsegaLu nAlukx riVtiya pAshagaLAgi
  pariNamisutatxve. aveMdare,}}
\newmeaning{\artha{tanuvinAse : deVhakokxVsakxra
  kamaRgaLanunx mADuvaMte parxcoV\-disuva AsegaLu;}}
\newmeaning{\artha{manadakAMkeSx : mAnasika saMtoVSakekx kamaRgaLanunx mADu\-vaMte parxcoVdisuva AsegaLu;}}
\newmeaning{\artha{BAvada Barxme : nAnu parashivaniMda parxteyxVkavAgidedxVne eMba
Barxme; I Barxmeyu namamx itara BarxmegaLigU, elalx riVtiya sAvxthaR
AsegaLigU mUla; matutx}}
\newmeaning{\artha{pArxNa hAgU parxpaMcada Ase. nAninUnx
badukirabeVku, parxpaMcadalelxV irabeVku sashariVriyAgeV irabeVku,
eMbudu koneya padada athaR. (va.pa.koV. 148)}}
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhapAshaH, catuviRdhashacx asw pAshashacx - catuviRdhapAshaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha puruSAthaR}
\meaning{\arthanonum{puruSa eMdare Atamx; athaRveMdare `goVsakxra'. hiVge
  puruSAthaRveMdare `AtamxnigoVsakxra'
  eMbathaR\-vuMTAgutatxde. AtamxnigoVsakxra nAvu catuviRdha
  PalapArxpitxya kaDe gamana koDabeVkAgutatxde. aveMdare, dhamaR,
  athaR, kAma, moVkaSx. ililx dhamaRveMdare kataRvayxvU hwdu, yajacnxyAgAdigaLU hwdu. athaRveMdare haNa. kuTuMba poVSaNege parxtiyobabxnu
athaR saMpAdane mADa\break\-beVku. dAMpatayx jiVvanada mUlaka kAmavanunx
taqpitxpaDisi\-koLaLxbeVku. hAgU koneyalilx moVkaSxvanunx
paDeyabeVku. kelavaru moVkaSxveV parama puruSAthaRveMdU modalina mUru
adakekx pUrakaveMdU vAdisidare, kelavaru parxti\-yoMdu puruSAthaRvU
uLida mUrariMda parxteyxVkaveMdu vAdisutAtxre.}
\ullekha{dhamaR athaR kAma moVkaSxveMba catuviRdha puru\-SAthaRMgaLaM keDisi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba 1000-331).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhapuruSAthaRH, catuviRdhashacx aswpuruSAthaRshacx - catuviRdhapuruSAthaRH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha pUvARsharxya}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMga, guru, jaMgama matutx parxsAda eMba rUpagaLanunx tALuvudakekx muMce avugaLige idadxMtha shile, manuSayx, jAtisUtaka matutx uciCxSaTx eMba nAlukx bageya asitxtavxgaLu: (viV.pA.koV. 162)}
\ullekha{shileyeMba pUvARsharxyava kaLedu liMgaveMda naraneMba pUvARsharxyava kaLedu guruveMda jAtisUtakada pUvARsharxyava kaLedu jaMgamaveMda eMjaleMba\break pUvARsharxyava kaLedu parxsAdaveMda iMtiV catuviRdhapUvAR\-sharxyava kaLeyabalalxnAgi kUDala cenanxsaMgayayxnalilx sharaNa savxtaMtarx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 130-38).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhapUvARsharxyaH, pUvaRshacx asw Asharxyashacx - pUvARsharxyaH catuviRdhashacx asw pUvARsharxyashacx - catuviRdhapUvARsharxyaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha Pala padavi}
\meaning{\arthanonum{\hbox{sAloVkayx,} sAmiVpayx, sArUpayx matutx sAyujayx eMba nAlukx bageya padavigaLu. shudAdhxtamxnu\break modalu paramAtamxnu iruva loVkakekx (sAloVkayx) hoVgu\-tAtxne. anaMtara paramAtamxna sAmiVpayxvanunx  paDeyutAtxne; paramAtamxnaMte shudadhxnAgi sArUpayxnAgutAtxne; koneyalilx paramAtamxnoMdige bereyutAtxne (Adare paramAtamxnAguvudilalx). I riVtiya nAlukx riVtiya PalapadagaLu AdhAyxtimxka jiVvanakekx sikakx bahumAna. I sidAdhxMtavu vacanakArariMda tirasakxrisalapxTiTxde. EkeMdare, avara parxkAra, ihaloVka matutx veYkuMTha athavA keYlAsa eMba eraDu  loVkagaLilalx. eraDaneyadAgi nAvu atayxMta sherxVSaThxvAda shivasAyujayxvanunx I janamxdalelxV sAdhisikoLaLxbeVkeV horatu, satatxnaMtaravalalx.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{kelavu vacanakArara parxkAra, catuviRdha PalapadaveMdare,\break aihika jiVvanadalelxV sAdhisikoLaLxbeVkAda nAlukx riVtiya padavi\-gaLu. aveMdare : guru, liMga, jaMgama matutx parxsAda.\break mAnava jiVvanada atayxMta sherxVSaThx dheyxVya liMgeYkayx \hbox{pArxpitxyeV} AdarU, A dheyxVya nAlukx rUpagaLalilx vayxkatxvAgutatxde. liMgAMga sAmarasayxda mUlaka jAcnxna (arivu) paDedavaneV guru; hiVge, moVkaSx paDeyuvudeMdarU oMdeV, guru\break\-padaviyanunx paDeyuvudeMdarU oMdeV; adeV riVti\break guruvu liMgadoDane sAmarasayx paDediruvudariMda guru matutx liMga samAna; hAgeyeV jaMgama saha guruvinaMte liMgasamAna. AdudariMda ivu mUru padavigaLU oMdeV padavi. tananx shariVra, karaNagaLu, Atamx muMtAduvugaLelalxvU tananxvalalx parashivana parxsAdaveMdu tiLidavanu (athavA tAneV parxsAdaveMdu tiLidavanu) mukatx. hiVge jiVvaMtavidAdxgaleV I catuviRdha Pala padaviyanunx paDeyabeVku. (va.pa.koV. 151)}}
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhaPalapadaviV catuviRdhAnAM PalAnAM padaviV - catuviRdhaPalapadaviV}}
\end{entry}

%\meaning{\arthanonum{dhamaR, athaR, kAma, moVkaSx. aSaTxvidhAcaRne SoVDasha upacariya SaTakxmaR tirxvidhavamaR catuviRdha PalaBoVga BoVjayx pUjA vayxvadhAna kamaRMgaLalilx soVdhisi vamaRvanariyabeVku. vamaRvanaritalilx savaR jiVvakekx shAMti, AcAyaRnaMgakekx vihita. savaR ceVtanAdi\break\-gaLalilx GAtakatanavilalxde mana vacana kAya tirxkaraNa shudadhx\-vAgi Ishavxra pUjeya mADuvAtava Asharxyada sheVshaparxsAdavakoMba\break vaqshicxka moVkaSxka vihaMga mAjARla iMtivaraMte sadaBxkatxna bAgi\-lalilx saMtata kAyuvaMte mADu cananx basavaNaNxpirxya BoVgamalilxkAjuRna liMgA.}}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha liMga}
\meaning{\arthanonum{guruliMga, shivaliMga, jaMgamaliMga matutx parxsAdaliMga eMba nAlukx liMgaparxBeVdagaLu :}
\ullekha{guruliMga shivaliMga jaMgamaliMga parxsAdaliMga iMtiV catuviRdhaliMgava EkiVkarisi pArxNaliMgavAda mahAmahimaMge kAmisalilalx kalipxsalilalx BAvisalilalx ciMtisalilalx Ata nishicxMta paramasuKi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1545-569).}}

%\begin{entry}
%\word{catuviRdha liMga}
%\meaning{\arthanonum{guru, liMga, jaMgama matutx parxsAda ivugaLanunx sAdhakanu modalu devxYta BAvadiMda AcarisutAtxne. karxmeVNa ivanenxV parashivana sAthxnakekx ErisutAtxne. Aga\break ivu guruliMga, shivaliMga, jaMgamaliMga, matutx parxsAda\-liMgagaLenisikoLuLxtatxve. guru matutx jaMgama ibabxrU liMga\-doMdige sAmarasayx paDediruvudariMda avaru liMgasamAnaru. liMgaveMdare modalu iSaTxliMgaveMba athaRvidudx, sAmarasayxdanaMtara adakekx parashiva eMba athaR barutatxde.\break parxsAdaveMdare modalu tinanxlu athavA kuDiyalu yoVgayx\-vAda padAthaR eMbathaRvidudx, konege sAdhakanu tananxnenxV saMpUNaRvAgi apiRsikoMDu, (sharaNAgatanAgi, sharaNAgi) parxsAda matutx parxsAdigaLigiruva vayxtAyxsavanunx aLisihAkuvudalalxde, tAnu shivana vAhanavenisikoLuLxtAtxne. aikayxsithxtiyalilx tAnU shivanAgutAtxne. hiVge parxsAdavAda avanU liMgavAgi, parxsAdaliMgavenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
%\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhaliMgaM, catuviRdhaM ca tatf liMgaM ca - catuviRdhaliMgaM}}
%\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha saMpAdane}
%\meaning{\arthanonum{ililx saMpAdane eMdare \hbox{saMdeVha} mADuvudu eMdathaR. guruvu liMgadiVkeSx koDalu ahaRnoV alalxvoV eMdu avana guNavanunx saMdeVhisuvudu guruvina guNasaMpAdane; iSaTxliMgakekx baLasalAgiruva kalulx yAva sathxLadodxV eMdu saMdeVhisuvudu liMgada sathxLa saMpAdane; yAru beVkAdarU jaMgamavAgalu sAdhayxviruvudariMda jaMgama oLeLxya jAtiyavanoV alalxvoV eMdu saMdeVhisuvudu jaMgamana jAti saMpAdane; parxsAdaveMdu\break sivxVkarisuva vasutxvige ruci ideyo ilalxvoV eMdu saMdeVhi\-suvudu parxsAdadalilx ruci saMpAdane. nijavAda Bakatxnu I\break catuviRdha saMpAdane mADabAradu. guruvina guNa\-vanUnx,\break iSaTxliMgakekx baLasa\-lAda kalilxna sathxLavanUnx, jaMgamana jAti\-yanUnx, parxsAdada ruciyanUnx arasutAtx hoVdare namamx saMdeVhakekx sUkatx parihAra sikakxdeV irabahudu. athavA\break sikikxdarU namamx Bakitx matutx sharxdedhx gaTiTxyAgadirabahudu. \hbox{Bakitxge} modalu beVkAdudu nisasxMshaya vishAvxsavAdudariMda yAvudeV riVtiya saMshayakekx eDeyirabAradu.}}
\meaning{\arthanonum{guru, liMga, jaMgama, parxsAda eMbuvugaLiMda sharaNanu\break niSeVdhisabeVkAda guNasaMpAdane, sathxlasaMpAdane, jAti\-saMpA\-dane matutx rucisaMpAdane eMba nAlukx vidhada saMpAdanegaLu: (viV.pA.koV. 163)}
\ullekha{guruliMgajaMgamaparxsAdaveMba Ganavana\char'273\char'236tu parxpaMcige ho\char'273\-tAgi iMtu catuviRdhasaMpAdanegaLaM toV\char'273\char'311da guheVshavxra\-liMgadalilx basavaNaNxniMda {nAlakx\char'273} aMtasathxvana\char'273\char'236denu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 888-275).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhasaMpAdanaM, catuviRdhasayx saMpAdanaM - catuviRdhasaMpAdanaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha saMbaMdhi}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgasaMbaMdhi, jAcnxnasaMbaMdhi, parxsAda\-saMbaMdhi matutx nijaliMgasaMbaMdhi, eMba nAlukx bagegaLu; tanuvina \hbox{hasivu,} taqSe, meYthuna. muMtAda sahaja. sahaja guNagaLanunx kaLedukoMDavanu liMga\-saMbaMdhiyAgutAtxne.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{manasusx parxpaMcada bagege hAgU parashivana bagege tananx sahaja ajAcnxnadiMdAgi aneVka tapupx kalapxnegaLanunx beLesi\-koMDirutatxde. kaLedu\-koMDare jAcnxnasaMbaMdhiyAgutatxde. idariMdAgi adakekx samayxgfjAcnxna uMTAgutatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{pArxNakekx sahajavAda sAvxthaR  AsegaLa kaLedukoMDu, muMtAdavugaLanunx tAnu mADuvudelalxvU tanagAgi alalx, liMgakAkxgi eMdu tiLidukoMDare, tananx karaNeVMdirxyAdigaLu tananxvalalx, liMgakekx seVridavu eMdu BAvisidare, Aga adu parxsAdasaMbaMdhi\-yAgutatxde. aMdare, tananx karaNeVMdirxyagaLU alalxde iDiV parxpaMcaveV shivana parxsAdaveMdu adu balavAgi naMbutatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{BAva (jiVva)kekx tAnu beVre, shiva beVre, parxpaMca beVre eMba\break sahajavAda BarxmegaLirutatxve. I BarxmeyaLidare, adakekx nija\-liMgasaMbaMdha uMTAgutatxde; aMdare tananxlilxruva liMgavu\break (ceYtanayxvu) vayxkatxvAgutatxde; athavA A ceYtanayxvu parashivanalalxde beVreyalalx eMba arivu mUDutatxde.}}
\newmeaning{\ni{catuviRdhasaMbaMdhiV, catuviRdhAnAM saMbaMdhaH asimxnf asitx iti - catuviRdhasaMbaMdhiV}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdha sananxhitaralalxdavara}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shivasAninxdhayxdiMda dUravAda areBakatx, liMganiSAThxrahita, jaMgamaperxVmavilalxdavanu matutx parxsAdAnugarxha rahita-eMba nAlavxru: (viV.pA.koV. 161)}

\meaning{\arthanonum{`cAvARka' eMbudu oMdu paMthada hesaroV, A paMthavanunx

  parxkAra, cAvARkaneMdare loVkA\-yata; aMdare, I loVkaveV aMtima,
  idakikxMta hecicxnadeVnU ilalx\break eMba sidAdhxMtavanunx
  parxtipAdisuvavanu. cAvARkanu parxtayxkaSx\-parxmANavanunx mAtarx
  naMbutAtxne. avana parxkAra iDiV vishavx paqthivx, apupx, vAyu,
  aginx eMba nAlukx tatatxvX\-gaLiMdAgide. AkAsha tatatxvXvu
  parxtayxkaSxkekx goVcaravAguvudilalxvAdudariMda\break AkAsha tatatxvXvu
  ilalxveV ilalx. jiVvavU ceVtanavU I nAlukx BUta\-gaLiMdaleV
  Agide. ele, aDike, suNaNxgaLalilx yAvoMda\-ralilx keMpu
  baNaNxvilalxdidadxrU, avu oMdu vishiSaTxparxmANadalilx kUDidare
  heVge keMpu baNaNxvanunx utapxtitx mADabalalxvoV, hAgeyeV I nAlukx
  BUtagaLalilx ceVtanavilalxdidadxrU, avu vishiSaTx parxmANagaLalilx
  kUDidAga kalulx, nadi, beTaTx, giDa, mara,\break danakarugaLu, manuSayxru
  utapxtitxyAgutatxve. deVhakikxMta Binanx\-vAda Atamxvilalx. deVhaveV
  Atamx. deVha athavA Atamxkekx punajaRnamxvilalx. loVkakikxMta
  hecicxna paramAtamxnilalx. iruvu\break\-doMdeV janamxveMda meVle, nAvu
  sAyuvudaroLagAgi\break AdaSuTx saMtoVSa paDabeVku; punajaRnamxvilalx;
  paramAtamxnU ilalx; eMda meVle nAvu saMtoVSapaDuva mAgaR
  aneYtika\-vAgidadxrU saMkoVcapaDabeVkAgilalx. savxgaR
  narakagaLilalxveMda meVle aneYtikarAgalu hedarabeVkAgilalx.}}

\begin{entry}
\word{citutx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{kelavu veVLe `citutx' eMba padakekx savx-parxjecnxyilalxda citutx
savx-parxjecnx\-yuLaLx citutx eMbathaRviruvudu kaMDubarutatxde. udAharaNege}
\ullekha{`Adi anAdiyiMdatatxtatxlAda nirAkAra paravasutx tananx\break savxrUpava
tAnariyade anaMta kalapxkalApxMtara iduR, tananx savxliVle\-yiMda tAneV
jagatfsaqSiTx nimitatxvAgi nenavudoVralu, A nenavu nidhARra\-vAgi
citetxnisitutx' (10:13)} \arthanonum{eMbalilx, shUnayxkUkx cititxgU
vayxtAyxsaviruvudu sapxSaTxvAgutatxde. Adi anAdiyiMdatatxtatxlAda
paravasutx anaMtakAla tAnoMde itutx,\break Adare adakekx tananx savxrUpada
bagegx ariviralilalx. iMtha savx-\-parxjecnx ilalxda paravasutxvanunx
vacanakAraru shUnayx, mahAshUnayx,\break muMtAgi karedidAdxre. iMtha
shUnayxdalilx yAvAgaloV savx-\-parxjecnx uMTAgi, tAnoMdeV iruvudu
arivAgi, jagatatxnunx\break saqSiTxsabeVku eMba nenahu taledoVri, nenaheV
gaTiTx\-goMDare, adu citetxnisikoLuLxtatxde. hAgAdare shUnayxdalilx
citutx iralilalxvoV? AgalU itutx. aMdare, shUnayxvu cititxna oMdu
sathxlavAdare, saqSiTx mADabeVkeMba nenahu (nidhARra) matotxMdu
sathxla. nidhARrakekx citf beVkeV beVku. EkeMdare, jaDa (acitf)
vasutxgaLu saqSiTxsabeVkeMdu nidhaRrisuvudilalx.\break alalxde,
shUnayxsathxladalelxV citf ilalxdidadxre, parashivanige\break nidhARra
sathxladalilx citutx elilxMda baralu sAdhayx? citutx para\-shivana
muKayx lakaSxNagaLalolxMdAgiruvudariMdaleV, avananunx
cidAnaMda cidAkAsha, citfsUyaR, citfparxkAsha, cidaGxna muMtAgi
kareyuvudu.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{I citatxnunx toVMTada sidadhxliMgaru niHkala liMgaveMdu
  karedi\-dAdxre. avarU saha citutx eMba padavanunx saqSiTxge
  saMbaMdhi\-sidaMte upayoVgisidadxrU, alilx citutx eMba padakekx beVre
  athaRvide. avara parxkAra} \ullekha{``niHkala shivatatatxvXdalilx jAcnxna\-citutx
  udayavAyitutx. A cititxniMda akAra, ukAra, makAragaLeMba
  akaSxratarxyagaLAdavu; akAraveV nAda, ukAraveV biMdu, makAraveV
  kaLe. iMtiV tirxvidhakekx tAyi citutx''.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{citf:}
\ullekha{citutx dhAyxna dheVyavoMdAda parxBeyadu mukitx mUla parxNavada parxBege Adi aMtayxvilalx satutx citutx nitayxparxBeya musuki niMdudu (hirimaM. 687-20); shUnayx sithxtigaLAda baLika citutx udaBxvisutatxde. Aga adu mUlacitutxveMtalU heVLalapxDutatxde (shivAkoV. 14-19).}}
\newmeaning{\artha{paravasutx; parashiva:}
\ullekha{citutx parabomamx paradeYvanAmamaM potitxpuRdaduve paramAtamx (savxrUpa. 391-19); matetx oMdu pariya toVrisida tatatxvXva tiLisi citutx niVne eMdu peVLida sadugxru\break\-rAya (kUDasavx. 11-2);
muMgeYya kaMkaNakekx kananxDiya toVruvaMte... enanx manavu nidhAnavanolalxde jalaga macicxtutx noVDA... (savasaM. 1; basava. 31-11); citutxveMba bitutx balidu eraDAdalilx liMgaveMba kaLe aMgulisi mUtiRyAyitutx. (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1187-350);\break nararu suraru navakoVTiyugagaLa parxLayakekx oLagAgi hoVdaru... rudarxMge kaNeNxve haLacitutx noVDire !... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1296-458); jaladalilx nore tere budubxdavidadxMte... malatarxyaMgaLiMda loVkaracane hecicxtutx... (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1418-409); guru tananx vinoVdakekx guruvAda... mADida pUjege kiMcitutx Palapadaviya koTuTx... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 199-58).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

  anuBavisutAtxne' eMdu\break tiLidukoLuLxtAtxne. idanunx pativarxteya
  upameya mUlaka\break vivarisabahudu. pativarxteyu heVge tAnu gaMDanigAgi
  idedxVne, tananx gaMDana suKaveV tananx suKa eMdu heVge
  tiLidukoLuLxtAtxLeyoV hAgeyeV sharaNasathxlada sAdhakanu tAnu
  parashivana\break BoVgakAkxgi eMdu tiLidukoLuLxtAtxne. I kAraNakAkxgiyeV\break
  sharaNanu tananxnunx parashivana sati (aMgane) eMdu tiLidukoLuLxtAtxne. (va.pa.koV. 157)}
\ullekha{ayayx bapupxda kaMDaLu cidaMgane ayayx, shudadhx saMgamake obabxne baMdanu, kapilasidadhxmalilxkAjuRnayayxna. shivapUjA maMtarxgaLalilx oMdu visheVSavide.\break iSaTxliMgAdi pUjegaLalilx upayoVgisuva
bahaLaSuTx maMtarx\-gaLa athaRgaLu gaMdhadhAraNe modalAda upacAragaLige\break saMbaMdhisuvudilalx. keVvala

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidha}
\src{va}
\meaning{\artha{mUru bage; mUru parxkAra:} \ullekha{vacana sAhitayxdalilx bahuvAgi baLasiruva I padakekx saMdaBARnusAravAgi aneVka bageya visheVSAthaRgaLu barutatxve. avugaLalilx kelavanunx ililx koDalAgide.}
\artha{guru, liMga, jaMgama:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx guruvanolisabeVku manava koTuTx liMgavanolisabeVku dhanava koTuTx jaMgamava\-nolisabeVku I tirxvidhava ho{\ra}gu mADi ha{\ro}ya hoyisi ku{\ru}ha pUjisuva goravara mecacx (savasaM. 1; basava. 206-52).}
\artha{liMga, jaMgama, parxsAda:}
\ullekha{liMgadalilx kaThiNavuMTe jaMgama\-dalilx kulavuMTe parxsAdadalilx aruciyuMTe I tirxvidhadalilx BAva\-BeVdavana{\ra}suvenu (savasaM. 1; basava. 286-70); liMga baMdu manavaniMbugoMbudu, jaMgama baMdu dhanavaniMbu\-goMbudu, parxsAda baMdu tanuvaniMbugoMbudu [I] tirxvi\-dhavu tAne ...niVnolida sharaNaMge daqSaTx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 58-19).}
\artha{tanu, mana, dhana:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx tanu bayalAyitutx manava koTuTx mana bayalAyitutx dhanava koTuTx dhana baya\-lAyitutx. I tirxvidhavanu koTuTx kUDalacenanxsaMgayayxnalilx basavaNaNxMge bayala samAdhiyAyitutx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1297-457).}
\artha{shudadhx, sidadhx, parxsidadhx parxsAdagaLu:}
\ullekha{shudadhxparxsAda guruvinadu sidadhxparxsAda liMgadadu parxsidadhxparxsAda jaMgamadadu iMtiV tirxvidha oMdAdavara toV{\rA} (savasaM. 1; basava. 791-201).}
\artha{utapxtitx, sithxti, layagaLeMba mUru avasethxgaLu:}
\ullekha{mUjaga\-dalilx ni[ru]taru kUDalasaMgana sharaNaru tirxvidhavana{\ri}\-yaru (savasaM. 1; basava. 902-235).}
\artha{manasathxla, tanusathxla, karasathxla:}
\ullekha{hara... gururUpAgi baMdu manasathxlakekx maMtarxvAda tanusathxlakekx parxsAdavAda karasathxlakekx liMga\-vAda iMtiV tirxvidhadalilx sAhitayxvAdanayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 22-10).}
\artha{tanushudadhx, manaHshudadhx, BAvashudadhx eMba mUru bageya shudadhxjiVvaru:}
\ullekha{tanushudadhxnAgi iSaTxliMgava pUjisabeVku mana\-shudadhx\-nAgi pArxNaliMgada dhAyxnisabeVku BAvashudadhxnAgi BAvaliMgava BAvisabeVku iMtiV tirxvidhavana{\ri}yade... Anu shudadhxnAdeneMba kirxyAdevxYtiyAda pAtakana nAyaka narakadalilxkukxva (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 939-298).}
\artha{kamaRkAMDa, BakitxkAMDa, jAcnxnakAMDa eMba mUru parxkAragaLu:}
\ullekha{kamaRkAMDa BakitxkAMDa jAcnxnakAMDa I tirxvidhadalilx vaMcakanAdaDe Isu vidhadoLage aMgavilalx (savasaM. 1; basava. 889-232).}
\artha{honunx, heNuNx, maNuNxgaLeMba mUru bageya kAmanegaLu:}
\ullekha{neneva manakekx maNaNxne toV{\ri}de noVDuva kaNiNxge heNaNxne toV{\ri}de pUjisuva keYge honanxne toV{\ri}de iMtiV tirxvidhavane toV{\ri} koTuTx ma{\ra}hanikikxdeyayAyx (savasaM. 8; nAgaNaNx. 8-4); a{\ri}vu bAhayxvAgi tirxvidhakekx kacAcxDaleVtakekx (savasaM. 7; GaTiTxvA. 430-152).}
\artha{acacxparxsAdi, nicacxparxsAdi, samaya parxsAdigeLeMba mUvaru parxsAdigaLu.}
\artha{AdhAyxtimxka, AdhiBwtika, AdhideYvikaveMba mUru bageya kaSaTxgaLu.}
\artha{tAyxgAMga, BoVgAMga, yoVgAMga eMba aMgatarxyagaLu.}

niVDutAtxne. parxLayakAladalilx kale modalAdavugaLa mUlaka malakamaRgaLiMda kUDikoLuLxva

eraDu vidha. modalaneya jiVva moVkaSxvanunx paDedare, eraDaneya jiVvanu puyaRSaTxkarUpadiMdidudx\break kamaRvashadiMda nAnA bageya janamxgaLanunx etutxtAtxne. aMtaH\-karaNa,
budidhx, kamaR matutx iMdirxyagaLa samUha puyaRSaTxka. adu sUkaSxmXshariVri.
mala-mAyA-kamaR eMba tirxvidha baMdhanagaLiMda kUDiruvaMtahadudx sakalajiVvi. AtanU saha

anugarxhadiMda maMDali modalAda 108 maMterxVshavxrara padaviyanunx paDeyutAtxne.
apakavxkaluSaru tamamx tamamx kamARnusAravAgi suKa-duHKagaLanunx anuBavisutAtxre.}}

  talupabeVkenunxvavanu I\break vAyxpAragaLanunx niyaMtirxsi 
  avugaLanunx AdhAyxtamx sAdhanege upayoVgisikoLaLxbeVku. Aga
  vAyupArxNi\-yAgidadx avanu liMgapArxNiyAgutAtxne. hatutx vAyugaLanunx

%senxVhitanAdavanu yAvAgalU tananx pirxya geLeyana joteyalilxralu
%bayasutAtxnoV, hAgeyeV nijavAda Bakatxnu yAvAgalU parashivana

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{nAgananenx (hAvanenx) ABaraNadaMte toTuTxkoMDiruva shivaneV

  Atamxnu AdhAracakarxdalilx malagidAdxne. kuMDaliyanunx
  jAgarxtagoLisi AdhAravanUnx uLida aidu cakarxgaLanUnx dATuvaMte
  perxVreVpisi konege adu sahasArxravanunx muTiTxdAga alilx adu
  nelesutatxde; athavA Atamxnu paramAtamxnalilx nelesutAtxne. hiVge
  parashivanu kuMDaliniVshakitxya aMtima guriyAgidAdxne. athavA
  nAgananunx avanu dharisidAdxne.}
\ullekha{BAvasahasarxmuKadalilx shoVBisutitxpaR jAcnxnaratanxMgaLiM manaveMba paqthivxgAdhAramAgipaR viveVkasapaRparxkAshadiMdopupxtipuRdariM nAgABaraNanAde. (savasaM. 13; mumamxDi. 1056-513).}}

\end{entry}

parxsAdisathxlavananxriyadidadxre nAlakxneya pAtaka, liMgadalilx

\ullekha{``liMgapiVThagaLu samavAgi paMcasUtarx parxmANavu AgamoVkatxdaMte shudadhxvAdare AyureYshavxyaRgaLuMTAguvuvu... liMgavaM baLasida sUtarx parxmANaveV 1. liMgapiVThavaM aLeyuvudu, 2. liMgoVnanxta piVThaparxmANa, 3. goVmuKada agarxliMga masatxkaparxmANa, 4. adaradhaRveV goVmuKavu, 5. -hiVge paMcasUtarxgaLu shivAgamadathaRvu" (viVsheYpu. 7neya kAMDa, tAtapxyaR\-caMdirxke. puTa 30); iMtu paMcasUtarxmuLaLx piVTha\-liMgadoLeMdeV jAtishilAdigaLAda kAMtimayavapapx liMgasathxlamaM tiVthARMbu paMcagavayx Basita mishorxVdakaMgaLiM paripUtamAda tirxvidha kuMBadoLf... avagAhamirisi (viveVka. 101); A paMcasUtarxda vidhAnaveMtene mahAshirxV paramaliMgamaM baLasidaR sUtarxveV tA pavaNadoMdu sUtarxM liMgapiVThavaLeyalekxraDu liMgoVnanxtaM A piVThadeDeyoLeV mU{\ru} goVmuKadagarx Opa liMgada masatxkakekx nAlakxda{\ra}dhaRveV parikisalekx goVmuKaviMtu paMcasUtarxM shivAgamadathaRveY (viVsheYpu. 7-105-47). ``shivaliMgagaLa parxtiSAThxkAladalilx gamanisuva liMgoVcacxte, liMga\-visAtxra, liMgaswthxlayx, piVThavisAtxra, parxnAlikAmAnagaLeMba aidu sUtarxgaLu" (kananxni. 5-5047);}}
\newmeaning{\artha{diVkASxvidhi muMtAda maMgaLakAyaR- gaLigAgi sAthxpi\-suva paMcakalashagaLalilxya gurukalashakekx, maMtarxdhAyxnasahitavAgi uragabaMdhadaMte saMbaMdhisuva aidu eLegaLu.}}
\newmeaning{\ullekha{saMcadoVvariyoLage paMcasUtarxvu miMci kaMcumiMcina saMcalana nuMgitu paMcasUtarxvu miMci saMcadoVvarigoMDu paMcamuKa paramaguruvAda sharaNa (padagoV. {\rm v-}2); I maMtarxdiMda gurukalashakekx paMcasUtarxMgaLanikikx paMcapalalxvaMgaLanikikx paMcamuKaMgaLanikikx gurukalashavaM sAthxpayxvaM mADuvudu (gaNaBA. 189-21).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{paMcasUtArxNi, paMca ca tAni sUtArxNi ca-paMcasUtArxNi}}

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgisathxla tirxvidha}
\meaning{\arthanonum{AdhAyxtimxka dAriyalilx parxgati sAdhisida Bakatxnu
  karasathxladalilx mAtarxvalalxde, deVhada elelxDeyalilxyU
  liMgasAthxpane mADabeVku. I BAvakekx pArxNaliMgisathxlavenunxtAtxre. idaralilx mUru upaBAgagaLidudx avugaLanunx
  anukarxmavAgi AcArapArxNi, liMgapArxNi matutx jaMgamapArxNi eMdu
  kareyalAgide. pArxNaliMgisathxlada modalane haMtadalilx Bakatxnu
  bAhayx AcAragaLige hecucx mahatavx koDutAtxne. sAnxna, liMga\-pUje,
  maMtarx, guru jaMgamagaLalilx Bakitx, parxsAda pAdoVdaka seVvane,
  muMtAda bAhayx AcAragaLu AdhAyxtimxka jiVvanakekx pArxraMBadalilx
  AvashayxkavAdarU aveV koneyalalx. Bakatx inUnx muMdakekx
  hoVgabeVkAdare, shivanu tananxlilxyeV idAdxneMdu tiLidu, dhAyxnada
  mUlaka shivananunx talupalu parxyatinxsabeVku. I parxyatanxvu
  avananunx liMgapArxNiyanAnxgi mADutatxde. dhAyxnada mUlaka avana
  matutx shivana madheyx dUra kaDimeyAdAga, (athavA avanu terehilalxda
Ganadalilx oMdAdAga) avanu tAneV liMgaveMdukoLuLxtAtxne. hiVge avanu
naDedADuva liMga\-vAdudariMda avanu jaMgama pArxNisathxladalilxdAdxneMdathaR. (va.pa.koV. 263)}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{bayalu}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parashivanige anavxyisuva pada. idu aMkitanAmavAgirade oMdu
  upameyAgide. AkAsha, cidAkAsha, cidaMbara ivu idara payARya
  padagaLu. shUnayx, shUnayxsathxla, niHshUnayx eMba padagaLU idara
  payARya padagaLu. parashivananunx bayaligeV (AkAshakekxV) Eke
  hoVlisabeVku eMbudakekx kelavu kAraNagaLive. 1. yAvudeV
  vasutxvAgali, adu eSeTxV doDaDxdirali, AkAshavu adanunx
  AvarisikoLuLxtatxdeyAdudariMda, elalx vasutxgaLigiMtalU athavA iDiV
  vishavxkikxMtalU AkAshaveV doDaDxdu enanxbahudu. hAgeyeV elalx
  vasutxgaLanUnx parashivanu oLagoLuLxvudariMda, avanU
  AkAshadaMtidAdxne enanxbahudu. vishavxvanonxLagoLuLxva AkAshavu
  BwtAkAshavAdare vishavxvanUnx, BwtAkAshavanUnx oLagoLuLxva
  parashivanu cidAkAsha. eraDaneyadAgi, moVDa, dhULu, muMtAda
  tAtAkxlika GaTanegaLu AkAshada mUlasavxrUpavanunx
  badalAyisuvudilalx. adeV riVti cidAkAshadalilxruva vasutxgaLu avu
  eSeTxV keTaTxdidadxrU cidAkAshavanunx keDisalAravu. mUrane kAraNa
  modalane eraDu kAraNagaLigiMta muKayxvAdudu. eraDu athavA hecucx
  vasutxgaLa madheyx iruva AkAshavanunx tiLidukoLaLxbahudeV horatu,
  vasutxrahita AkAshavananxlalx. eraDu vasutxgaLa madhayxdalilxruva
  AkAsha doDaDxdu athavA saNaNxdu eMdU, aneVka vasutxgaLa
  madhayxdalilxruva AkAsha cwkAkAradudx, GanAkaqtiyuLaLxdudx eMdU
  vaNiRsabahudu. AkAshadalilx yAva vasutxgaLU ilalxdidadxre, adu
  saNaNxdU alalx, doDaDxdU alalx, tirxkoVNAkaqtiyU alalx, cwkAkaqtiyU
  alalx, matAtxva AkaqtiyU alalx. adu vaNaRnege sikukxvudilalx. adeV
  riVti parashivanalilx vishavxveV ilalxdaMtha avasethxyalilx
  (shakitxyu avayxkatxvAgiruvaMtha parxlayasithxtiyalilx) parashivanu
kAraNanU alalx, kArayxnU alalx, doDaDxvanU alalx, saNaNxvanU
alalx. avanu A sithxtiyalilx vaNaRnAtiVtanAgutAtxne. (va.pa.koV. 266)}}

aMgaM ca caraliMgeVna saMyukatxM pArxNaliMgi yatf ||\\

mahAliMga samAyukatxmaMgameYkayxsathxlaM paramf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 72-82)}
\newmeaning{\artha{AcAraliMga modalAda Aru liMgagaLu matetx talA mUru mUru vidhavAgutatxve. AcAraliMgavu sadAcAraliMga, niyatAcAraliMga, gaNAcAra\-liMga; guruliMgavu diVkASxguruliMga, shikASxguruliMga, anuBAvaguruliMga; shivaliMgavu iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga; caraliMgavu savxya\-liMga, cara\-liMga, paraliMga; parxsAdaliMgavu shudadhxparxsAdaliMga, sidadhxparxsAdaliMga, parxsidadhx\-parxsAdaliMga; mahAliMgavu piMDajaliMga, aMDajaliMga, biMdAvxkAsha\-liMgaveMdu oTuTx hadineMTu liMgagaLAgutatxve.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sathxlamAcAraliMgasayx tirxvidhaM shUrxyatAM karxmAtf |\\
sadAcArasutx niyaatoV gaNAcArasatxthAparaH ||\\
diVkASx shikASxnuBAvashacx guruliMgaM tirxdhA BaveVtf |\\
shivaliMga savxrUpaM teV vakASxyXmi shurxNu pAvaRti ||\\
iSaTxliMgaM pArxNaliMgaM BAvaliMgamiti tirxdhA ||\\
caraliMgasathxlasAyxsayx savxrUpaM kathayAmi teV |\\
savxyaM caraM paraM ceVti terxYvidhayxM samupAgatamf ||\\
parxsAdaliMgaterxvidhayxmapi shurxNu varAnaneV |\\
shudadhxM sidadhxM parxsidadhxM ca BeVdashecxYSAmathoVcayxteV ||\\
mahAliMgasathxlaM cApi tirxdhA BinanxM shurxNu karxmAtf |\\
piMDajuM parxthamaM porxVkatxmaMDajaM ca tataH paramf ||\\
biMdAvxkAsha tatoV jecnxVyameVSAM lakaSxNamucayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 8-26)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sithxra, cara, sithxracara, carasithxra, sithxrasithxra, caracara eMdu liMgavu Aru vidha. (lakaSxNagaLanunx Adharisida BeVda).}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sithxraM caraM sithxracaraM carasithxramathAMbikeV |\\
sithxrasithxraM caracaraM SaDivxdhaM liMgalakaSxNamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 16. 9)}
\newmeaning{\SEE{AyA padagaLu}}
\newmeaning{\artha{utatxma, madhayxma, adhama eMdu liMgavu mUru vidha. ivu talA matetx mUru mUru vidhavAgi oTuTx oMbatutx vidhavAgutatxve. ELu-eMTu-oMbatutx aMgulagaLa liMgavu utatxma; nAlukx-aidu-Aru aMgulagaLa liMgavu madhayxma; oMdu-eraDu-mUru aMgulagaLa liMgavu adhama enisutatxve. niVrina meVlina guLeLxya AkAradudx utatxmaliMga; koVLimoTeTxya AkAradudx madhayxma; hasuvina hegalina AkAradudx madhayxmaliMga (AkArada AdhAradiMda uMTAda BeVda). oMdu, eraDu, mUru, nAlukx, aidu, Aru, ELu, eMTu, oMbatutx aMgula gAtarxda oMbatutx liMgagaLu.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
utatxmaM madhayxmaM niVcamiti liMgaM tirxdhoVcayxteV |\\
ESevxVkeVna tirxdhA tadavxdukatxmaMgulamAnataH ||\\
navASaTxsapAtxMgulakaM liMgaM sherxVSaThx tathA samxqqtamf |\\
SaDfpaMcakacatumARnaM madhayxmaM tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\
tirxdevxyXVkAMgulamAniVyaM tirxvidhaM tasayx saMsakxqqtamf |\\
EvaM navavidhaM porxVkatxM yathA karxmAtf ||\\
utatxmaM budubxdhAkAraM madhayxmaM kukukxTAMDavatf |\\
adhamaM goVkakutf parxKayxmiti liMgaM tirxdhA samxqqtamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sheY. ra., BA-2, 4. 52-55)}
\newmeaning{\artha{aKaMDaliMga, BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga, paqthivxVrUpada AcAraliMga, jalarUpada guruliMga, teVjoVrUpada shivaliMga, vAyurUpada caraliMga, AkAshamayavAda parxsAdaliMga, AtamxtatatxvXrUpada mahA\-liMga-eMdu hatutx vidha liMgagaLu.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
iSaTxliMga parxkaqtikaM AcAraguruliMgakeV |\\
pAthiRvApeyxV iti porxVketxV sheYvAgamavishAradeYH ||\\
pArxNaliMgaparxkaqtikeV teVjoVvAyumayeV tathA |\\
shivaliMgacarABiKeyxV liMgeV devxV varavaNiRni ||\\
voyxVmaparxkaqtikaM liMgaM pArxsAdAKayxM mahatatxramf |\\
AtamxtatatxvXmayaM porxVkatxM mahAliMgaM mahatatxramf ||\\
iti sidAdhxMtasheVKaravacaneVnoVkAtxnAM dashavidhaliMgAnAmf...
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 73)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga eMdu liMgasathxlavu mUru vidha. I mUru liMgagaLu matetx talA eraDeraDAgutatxve. BAvaliMgavu mahAliMga, parxsAdaliMga eMdU, pArxNaliMgavu caraliMga, shivaliMga eMdU, iSaTxliMgavu guruliMga, AcAraliMgaveMdU talA eraDeraDAgi oTuTx Aru liMgasathxlagaLAgutatxve.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgasathxlaM tirxdhA jecnxVyaM tadeBxVdoV vaNayxRteV karxmAtf ||\\
parxthamaM BAvaliMgaM sAyxdf divxtiVyaM pArxNaliMgakamf |\\
taqtiVyamiSaTxliMgaM sAyxditeyxVtatf tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\
EkameVkaM sathxlaM BUyoV divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf ||\\
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxM liMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\
BAvaliMgaM BavateyxVva sAvxnuBUtiparxmANataH ||\\
tathA ca caraliMgaM ca shivaliMgamiti davxyamf |\\
pArxNaliMgaM BavateyxVva tAtapxyARthoRV na saMshayaH ||\\
guruliMgaM tathA{\char'263\char'263}cAraliMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\
iSaTxliMgaM BavateyxVva satayxmukatxmidaM mayA ||\\
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxliMgaM ca caraliMgakamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 3. 16-21)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BAvAdiliMgatirxtayaM divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\
BAvaliMgaM mahAliMga parxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf ||\\
pArxNaliMgaM tathA carashivaliMgadavxyaM BaveVtf |\\
iSaTxM tu guruliMgAKayxmAcArAKayxM davxyaM BaveVtf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 26-27)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{liMgAMgasAmarasayxdalilx aneVka parxBeVdagaLive. muKayxvAgi sAdhana\-sahita matutx sAdhanarahita eMdu eraDu vidha. veVdhA, manu (maMtarx), kirxyA eMba mUru diVkeSxgaLiMda uMTAguva sAdhanegaLiMda sAdhisuvaMtahadudx sAdhanasahita liMgAMgasAmarasayx. shirxVguruvina upadeVshavanunx pAlisuvudariMda uMTAguvudu sAdhanarahita liMgAMgasAmarasayx enisive.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAMgasAmarasayxsayx parxkArAH bahavoV mayA ||\\
daharoVpAsanAdhAyxyeV saMvagoRVpAsanAdayaH |\\
sahitAH sAdhaneVneYteV rahitAH sAdhaneYsatxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 19. 9-10)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAMgayoVH sAmarasayxM jiVvabarxhemxYkayxlakaSxNamf ||\\
tadapi divxvidhaM porxVkatxM sAdhaneVna samanivxtamf |\\
divxtiVyaM tadivxnimuRkatxmAdayxM gurukaqtaM parA ||\\
divxtiVyamapi shiSayxsayx guruvAkayxsayx pAlanAtf |\\
AdayxM veVdhAdidiVkASxBAyxsitxrX puMDarxsAyxpi dhAraNAtf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 19. 2-4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nitayxliMgAcaRne, kAmayxliMgAcaRne eMdu liMgAcaRneyu eraDu vidha. iSATxthaRvanunx pUreYsuvudu kAmayxliMgAcaRne, pApanAshakavAdadudx nitayxliMgAcaRne.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAcaRnaM tu divxvidhaM nitayxkAmayxviBeVdataH |\\
tatheYva haradatAtxyeRYrukatxM tAtapxyaRsaMgarxheV ||\\
devxVdhA tavAcaRnavidhisatxruNeVMdumwleV |\\
kAmAyakashicxdaparoV duritakaSxyAya |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(paM. ca., 1. 5-6)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{iSaTxliMgapUjeyu mahatiV, guviRV, laGivxV, avasarA eMdu nAlukx vidha. mahatiV pUjeyanunx utatxmanu (SaTfkAlagaLalilx pUjemADuvavanu), guviRVpUjeyanunx madhayxmanu (tirxkAla pUjemADuvavanu), ashakatxnu pArxtaHkAlakAla muMtAda samayadalilx BoVjana samayadalilx avasarA pUjeyanunx mADabeVku. }}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
utatxmoV mahatiVM kuyARdf guviRVM madhayxma Eva ca |\\
laGivxVmashakatxH kuyARcacx sAyaM mAdhAyxhanxkeV tathA ||\\
avasarA BoVjaneV porxVkAtx pArxtarAdiSu suvarxteV |\\
tirxkAlamacaRnAM kuyARcaCxkatxH SaTfkAlameVva vA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kA. A., kirx. pA., 4. 5-6; makuTa., kirx. pA., 3. 3-4)}
\newmeaning{\SEE{mahatiVpUjA, guviRVpUjA, laGivxVpUjA, avasarApUjA}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{pArxNa, apAna, vAyxna, udAna, samAna eMdu parxdhAnavAgi aidu BeVda. raMBa eMbudu Araneyadu. ivu karxmavAgi AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, caraliMga, parxsAdaliMga, mahAliMgada rUpagaLu. nAga, kUmaR, kaqkara, deVvadatatx, dhanaMjaya, satxMBa eMdu Aru upavAyugaLu. I upavAyugaLu karxmavAgi Bakatx, mAheVshavxra, parxsAdi, pArxNaliMgi, sharaNa, aikayx eMba SaTfsathxlarUpagaLu.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
vAyavaH-pArxNaH apAnaH vAyxnaH udAnaH samAnaH raMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH AcAraliMga guruliMga shivaliMga jaMgamaliMga parxsAdaliMga mahAliMgarUpAH |...\\
upavAyavaH-nAgaH kUmaRH kaqkaraH deVvadatatxH dhanaMjayaH satxMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH BakatxmAheVshavxraparxsAdi pArxNaliMgi sharaNeYkayxrUpAH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shurx. sA., 16, pu. 8)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sAmAnayx, visheVSa, nirABAriV eMdu viVrasheYvavu mUru vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
punaH tirxvidhameVtadidhx sAmAnAyxdiBeVdataH |\\
sAmAnayxshacx visheVSashacx nirABAriVti ca tirxdhA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 35; sU. A., kirx. pA., 7. 30)}
\newmeaning{\SEE{sAmAnayxviVrasheYva, visheVSa viVrasheYva, nirABAriV viVrasheYva}}
\newmeaning{\artha{shwrxtaviVrasheYva, savxtaMtarxviVrasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha. vaNARsharxma dhamaRda AcaraNeyiMda saMpananxvAdudu shwrxtaviVrasheYva. vaNARsharxmadhamaRda AcaraNeyilalxdudx savxtaMtarx viVrasheYva.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
viVrasheYvaM parxvakASxyXmi viditaM shurxtitaMtarxyoVH |\\
shwrxtaM savxtaMtarxmiti ca divxvidhaM parikiVtiRtamf ||\\
vaNARsharxmiVyadhamARDhayxM shwrxtamitayxBidhiVyateV |\\
tadiVyadhamaRrahitaM savxtaMtarxmiti kathayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 30-31)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{pUvaRshAMBaviV, utatxrashAMBaviV eMdu I muderxyu eraDu vidha. nAsikAgarxdaqSiTxyiMdalU, nAdAnu saMdhAnavanunx mADuva manasisxnoMdige kUDuva muderx pUvaRshAMBaviV eMdenisutatxde. nAsikAgarxdaqSiTx matutx manasusx nAdabarxhamxdalilx muLugidare utatxrashAMBaviV muderx eMdenisutatxde.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., pu. 146)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
nAsAgarxdatatxnimiSoVnimxSabAhayxdaqSATxyX\\
lakeSxyXV sadAshivavimashaRkagUDhadaqSATxyX |\\
joyxVtiH savxrUpamacalaM haqdi bAhayxhiVnaM\\
pashayxMti yeV ta iha saMyaminaH kaqtAthARH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 5. 7)}
\newmeaning{\artha{shivajAcnxna, shivaBakitx, shivadhAyxna, shivavarxta, shivapUje eMdu shivayoVgavu aidu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
jAcnxnaM shivamayaM BakitxH sheYviV dhAyxnaM shivAtamxkamf |\\
sheYvavarxtaM shivAceRVti shivayoVgoV hi paMcadhA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 1. 15)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{yoVga}}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{vaMshayxshiSayx, AgaMtukashiSayx eMdu eraDu vidha. vaMshayxshiSayxnu matetx muKayx matutx sAmAnayx eMdu eraDu vidha. muKayx shiSayxnu barxhamxcAri, gaqhasathx eMdu eraDu vidha. barxhamxcAriyu paTATxdhikAri carapati, nirABAri eMdu mUru vidha. beVre vaMshadalilx janisida shiSayxnu AgaMtuka shiSayx eMdenisutAtxne.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
vaMshayx AgaMtukashecxVti divxvidhaH shiSayx ucayxteV |\\
muKayxH sAmAnayxH iteyxVvaM punavaRMshoyxV divxdhA mataH ||\\
barxhamxcAriV gaqhiV ceVti divxdhA muKoyxV viBidayxteV |\\
ukatxlakaSxNasaMpanonxV barxhamxcAriV punasitxrXdhA ||\\
paTATxBiSeVkavAnAdayxH yaH porxVkatxshacxrapatisatxthA |\\
nirABArasatxqqtiVyaH sAyxtf savaRloVkeVSu vishurxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 14. 2-4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{AcAra BeVdadiMda sheYvavu aneVka vidhavAgutatxde. AyA AcAragaLanunx parxtipAdisuva matavu AyA sheYvanAmagaLiMda kareyalapxDutatxve.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{eraDu vidha-(a) sheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM ca viVrasheYvaM ca divxvidhaM sheYvamiVritamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 8. 2)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(A) shwrxtasheYva, ashwrxtasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM tu divxvidhaM porxVkatxM shwrxtamashwrxtameVva ca |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sheY. ra., BA-2, 2. 23)}
\newmeaning{\artha{nAlukx vidha-sAmAnayxsheYva, misharxsheYva, shudadhxsheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu nAlukx vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sAmAnayxsheYvaM parxthamaM misharxsheYvaM tataH paramf ||\\
shudadhxsheYvaM tathA jecnxVyaM viVrasheYvaM tataH paramf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(vA. shu. A., 10. 10-11)}
\newmeaning{\artha{aidu vidha-shudadhxsheYva, misharxsheYva, mAgaRsheYva, viVrasheYva, avAMtara sheYva eMdu aidu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shudadhxsheYvaM misharxsheYvaM mAgaRsheYvaM taqtiVyakamf |\\
catuthaRM viVrasheYvaM ca paMcamoV{\char'263}vAMtarasatxthA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 17. 4)}
\newmeaning{\artha{ELu vidha-(a) anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, mahAsheYva, anusheYva, avAMtarasheYva, parxvarasheYva, aMtayxsheYva eMdu ELu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvAH sapatxvidhA jecnxVyAsetxVSAM BeVdAnf shaqNu karxmAtf |\\
anAdisheYvaH parxthamamAdisheYvasatxtaH paramf ||\\
mahAsheYvasatxtoV jecnxVyasatxvXnusheYvasatxtaH paramf |\\
avAMtarasatxtoV jecnxVyaH parxvarasatxdanaMtaramf ||\\
aMtayxsheYvasatxtoV jecnxVyaH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 7. 4-6)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(A) viVrasheYva, anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, anusheYva, mahAsheYva, yoVgasheYva, jAcnxnasheYva eMdu ELu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM sapatxvidhaM puNayxM viVrasheYvAdi BeVdataH |\\
viVrasheYvaM tathAnAdisheYvamAdiparaM tataH ||\\
anusheYvaM mahAsheYvaM yoVgasheYvaM tu SaSaThxkamf |\\
sapatxmaM jAcnxnasheYvAKayxM... ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 1. 15, 17)}
\newmeaning{\artha{eMTu vidha-anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, pUvaRsheYva, misharxsheYva, shudadhxsheYva, sAmAnayxsheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu eMTu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
adhunA teV parxvakASxyXmi sheYvaBeVdamanutatxmamf |\\
anAdisheYvaM parxthamamAdisheYvaM divxtiVyakamf ||\\
pUvaRsheYvaM taqtiVyaM sAyxtf misharxsheYvaM catuthaRkamf |\\
shudadhxsheYvaM paMcamaM sAyxtf SaSaTxM veY mAgaRsheYvakamf ||\\
sAmAnayxM sapatxmaM jecnxVyaM viVrasheYvamathASaTxmamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 4-5)}
\newmeaning{\artha{hadineYdu vidha-AdisheYva, mahAsheYva, anusheYva, avAMtarasheYva, aMtayxsheYva, parxvarasheYva, sheYva, pAshupata, soVma, dakiSxNa, kAlAmuKa, lAkula, pUvaRsheYva, mAgaRsheYva, shudadhxsheYva eMdu hadineYdu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
AdisheYva mahAsheYvAdi SaTfsheYvAni BUyoV{\char'263}pi sheYvAH pAshupatA ituyxkAtxni sheYvAni SaTf pUvaRsheYvamAgaRsheYvashudadhxsheYvamiti sheYvatarxyamf EvaM paMcadashavidhAni sheYvAni |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. viV. sA. saM., BA-1, pu. 11)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{ApeVkiSxka matutx anApeVkiSxka eMdu satayxvu eraDu vidha. maNuNx modalAdavugaLa savxrUpa ApeVkiSxka satayx, EkeMdare parxLalakAladalilx adara aBAvaviruvudeV Agide. barxhamxsavxrUpa AnApeVkiSxka satayx, EkeMdare adu yAvAgalU iruvudeV Agide.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
tacacx satayxM divxvidhamf |\\
ApeVkiSxkamanApeVkiSxkaM ceVti |\\
maqdAdisavxrUpamApeVkiSxkaM satayxmf |\\
parxlayakAleV tasAyxpayxBAvAtf |\\
barxhamxsavxrUpamanApeVkiSxkamf |\\
tasayx sadA satAvxtf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-1, pu. 211)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nitayx, neYmititxka, kAmayx, nitayxneYmititxka, nitayxkAmayx eMdu sadAcAravu aidu vidha.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sadAcAraH bahuvidhAH parxmANeYrupavaNiRtAH |\\
saMkeSxVpataH paMcavidhA AcArAH niviRsheVSakAH ||\\
nitayxM neYmititxkaM kAmayxM nitayxneYmititxkaM tathA |\\
nitayxkAmayxmiti pArxhuH paMcadhA shAsatxrXkoVvidaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-2, 5. 9-10)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{barxhamxcAri, gaqhasathx,, nirABAri eMdu sahaja jaMgama mUru vidha. I mUvaru utatxroVtatxravAgi sherxVSaThxru. avaranunx vidhivatAtxgi pUjisabeVku.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
barxhamxcAriV gaqhiV ceYva nirABAriVti teV tarxyaH ||\\
yathoVtatxraM vishiSayxMteV pUjaniVyA yathAvidhi |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 4. 8)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{I diVkeSxyu sabiVja, abiVja (nibiRVja), cinamxya eMdu mUru vidha. I mUru BeVdagaLu karxmavAgi kamaRkAMDa, BakitxkAMDa, jAcnxnakAMDagaLalilx sapxSaTxvAgive.}}

citutx eMba arivu mUDutatxde. idelalx toVrikeyU ajAcnxna athavA
mAyeyiMda.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{Adare vacanakAraru parxpaMcavu BarxmeyalalxveMdU, vAsatxvika

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{mAyeyu ``adhoVmAye'' matutx ``UdhavxRmAye'' eMdu eraDu

  ``Bakitxshakitx'' eMba padagaLige payARya padagaLAgive (noVDi : {\bf

\newmeaning{\artha{matotxMdathaRdalilx yAvudu sakalaranUnx kADutatxdeyoV adeV

  mAye'' (1:15) eMbalilx I athaR sapxSaTxvAgutatxde. mAye iMdArxdi
  deVvategaLanunx kADutatxde muMtAda vAkayxgaLu `mAye' eMdare kaSaTx
  athavA keVDu mADuva shakitx eMdAgutatxde. hari haMdiyAdudu,
  barxhamxnige shira hoVdudu, deVveVMdarxnu shApagarxsatxnAgi
  roVgiyAdudu, itAyxdigaLelalx parashivana mAyeyiMdAgiye. Adare mAye
  obabx heMgasu eMdu tiLiyuvudu tapupx. vacanakAraru mAyeyanunx
  mAyAMgane, muMtAgi sitxrXVvAcaka padagaLiMda karedidadxrU, mAye
  heMgasalalx. vacanasAhitayxdalilx kirxyAshakitx, icACxshakitx,
  itAyxdi shakitxgaLa paTiTxyalAlxgali, sadAshiva, Ishavxra, itAyxdi
  sAdAKayx (adhideVvate)gaLa paTiTxyalAlxgali mAye eMba vayxkitxyu
  seVpaRDeyAgilalx.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{``Ase'' eMbudu ``mAye''ya matotxMdu athaR. ``manada muMdaNa
  AseyeV mAye'' eMbalilx idu sapxSaTxvAgutatxde. pArxyashaH
  `aniyaMtirxta Ase' eMbudu adara oLAthaRvirabahudu.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{marevu athavA ajAcnxna (avideyx) eMbudu matotxMdu athaR. nAvu

  dheyxVyada bagegx jAcnxnavilalxdidadxre, nAvu
  mAyegoLagAgidedxVveMdathaR (noVDi : {\bf mAyAkAvaLa, mAyACAye}).}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{sidadhxrAmanu ivelalxvanUnx tAtapxyaRrUpadalilx ``yoVgige

gaMdhavanunx apiRsi, taqpitxyeMba parxsAda paDeyutAtxne. koneyadAgi
Bakatxnalilxya aikayxnige paqthivxyalilxruva AtamxneV aMga; adakekx
